"Ah, you came at a good time. I'm so hap: "Lisa just spoke with the native creatures here! It's really amazing!"
"Don't you think it's amazing they can communicate with ARKS?"
"Don't you think that the words we use to communicate with each other are quite complicated?"
"With such a small body, I have no idea how they're able to speak and comprehend us with their small brains."
"But, but, but, Lisa is more interested in their being able to speak for a different reason."
"Lisa wants to know what kind of sound they would make if they happened to be shot."
"Fufu, don't you think you should praise Lisa for her restraint?"
"Otherwise next time, all of them might be suddenly be riddled with bullets."
